entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow or ice pellets beginning in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
